```{r setup, include = FALSE}
library(ggplot2)
library(tidyverse)

load("ethnobotanydata.rda")
```

```{r, echo= FALSE}
devtools::install_github("GuangchuangYu/hexSticker")
library(hexSticker)
library(ggplot2)

DF <- data.frame(variable = as.factor(1:10),
                 value = sample(10, replace = TRUE))
                 
p<-ggplot(DF, aes(variable, value, fill = variable)) +
  geom_bar(width = 1, stat = "identity") +
  scale_y_continuous(breaks = 0:nlevels(DF$variable)) +
  theme_minimal() +
  coord_polar()+ 
  theme_void() + 
  theme_transparent() + 
  theme(legend.position="none")
  
sticker(p, p_size=6, s_x=1, s_y=.75, s_width=1.5, s_height=1.2, h_fill = "lightgreen", h_color = "forestgreen", p_family = "serif", p_color = "forestgreen", package="ethnobotanyR")
```
